transcript:
Customer: Haan boliye madam.
Executive: Oh haan ji [inaudible] ji aa rahi hai aapki voice clear?
Customer: Haan boliye boliye. Thoda takleef ho raha hai aapki aawaz mein.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Aise network issue ho sakta hai. Haan ji sir main dekhiye ab main aapke account manager hoon, do bhi month pehle promote ho gaye hain. To ab main hi handle karungi.
Customer: Aap ek baar mujhe GST number de dijiye, main aapka yahan par update kar deti hoon.
Executive: GST number to mera update kiya hua hai madam. But baat hai na GST ke hisab se wo jo city hai, city wahan pe likha bhi nahi hai but wo city wahan pe galti se dal gaya.
Customer: To sir kya hona chahiye city mein? Aap usko theek hai bol.
Executive: Aapki aawaz clear nahi hai madam. Aap log kaun sa phone se baat kar rahe hain? Aapka aawaz clear nahi.
Customer: Aapke dusre number pe call karoon?
Executive: Number ki baat nahi hai, aapko mera number to sahi hai na? Mera number se koi problem nahi hai.
Customer: Aapko issue ho raha hoga.
Executive: Ah, main aapko call karta hoon. Aapka number bol ke bataiye mujhe.
Customer: Aap haan ye number hai sir, ispe call kar lo aap.
Executive: Nahi nahi isme nahi hai, aapka number bataiye.
Customer: Sir ek minute. Sir 78
Executive: 78
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: 770
Customer: Sunai nahi diya.
Executive: 780
Executive: 78 to likha uske baad kuch sunai nahi de raha hai aur.
Customer: Sir 78770
Executive: Okay, I am hearing. Aapka shubh naam kya hua? Main aapko call kar leta hoon.
Customer: [inaudible]
Customer: Sir main aapko phir se number bhejti hoon, theek hai, ye WhatsApp pe.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's city is incorrect in GST details.

- Executive's voice is unclear to the customer.



Resolution:

- Executive asked for customer's number to call back.

- Customer offered to send number via WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- gst, city, account manager, call quality
